article_title: Gruff Rhys pulls out of festival in Gaza protest
sentence: Israel  launched  a  campaign  in  Gaza  after  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  253  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Gruff Rhys pulls out of festival in Gaza protest
sentence: More  than  30,000  people  in  Gaza,  mostly  women  and  children,  have  been  killed  since  then,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
